title: Chiefs-49ers and where Colin was right & wrong
itunes:title: Chiefs-49ers and where Colin was right & wrong
description:
Colin discusses the Chiefs win over the 49ers, why Kansas City is scary good, why we shouldn't be so hard on Kyle Shanahan and Jimmy Garoppolo. Also Colin explains where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Shannon Sharpe, Marcellus Wiley, Reggie Bush, and Orlando Scandrick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
